body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"What will be the remainder when "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"7^{26} \\times 5^{83}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is divided by 100?"}]},{"type":"text","text":"\n\n"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Please post good solutions."}]}]}
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Work out the sum of all positive integers below 100."}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Using formula for the sum of first "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" integers, which is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\dfrac{n(n+1)}2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1+2+3+...+99=\dfrac{99(99+1)}2=\boxed{4950}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                    "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Relevant wiki: Arithmetic Progression","marks":[{"type":"italic"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"It is an "},{"type":"text","text":"Arithmetic Progression","marks":[{"attrs":{"href":"","target":"_blank"},"type":"link"}]},{"type":"text","text":" with "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"d=1, n=99,a_1=1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a_8=99"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". We want to find the sum of terms, so"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"s_n=\dfrac{n}{2}(a_1+a_n)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\implies"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"s_8=\dfrac{n}{2}(a_1+a_8)=\dfrac{99}{2}(1+99)=\color{#D61F06}\boxed{4950}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}
